snippet.title: Space Scavenger 2: Galactic Gauntlet - Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1962010/Space_Scavenger_2/

Space Scavenger 2: Galactic Gauntlet is an Action-Roguelike where you scavenge for modules to build a hodgepodge spaceship. Craft parts, upgrade and customize your ship on-the-fly to make the best of a terrible situation. As you are forced to complete a Gauntlet run through the Galaxy, you receive some unexpected help from... yourself. Playful and colorful - who said you can't smack aliens with a huge hammer in space?
